metadata.description: For the first time ever read the entire Moon Lake series from the hilariously psychotic mind of Dan Fogler! Zombie dinosaurs, a mass-murdering high school cheerleader, an inter-dimensional Sasquatch trying to save his species from extinction - all created by the lunar radiation in the small town of Moon Lake. With an alien invasion on the horizon, the weird heroes of Moon Lake will have to time, space and genre to save all of mankind. The Moon Lake Omnibus features art form Kevin Colden (The Crow: Death and Rebirth), Alex Horley (Warcraft), Fernando Pinto (TMNT), and more with a story written by New York Times-bestselling author Kevin J Anderson.
metadata.name: Moon Lake Omnibus
